00040 class NMFMultiplicativeDivergenceUpdate
00041 {
00042  public:
00043   // Empty constructor required for the WUpdateRule template.
00044   NMFMultiplicativeDivergenceUpdate() { }

00047   void Initialize(const MatType& dataset, const size_t rank)
00048   {
00049     (void)dataset;

00066   template<typename MatType>
00067   inline static void WUpdate(const MatType& V,
00068                             arma::mat& W,
00069                             const arma::mat& H)
00070   {
00071     // Simple implementation left in the header file.
00072     arma::mat t1;
00073     arma::rowvec t2;
00074 
00075     t1 = W * H;
00076     for (size_t i = 0; i < W.n_rows; ++i)
00077     {
00078       for (size_t j = 0; j < W.n_cols; ++j)
00079       {
00080         // Writing this as a single expression does not work as of Armadillo
00081         // 3.920.  This should be fixed in a future release, and then the code
00082         // below can be fixed.
00083         //t2 = H.row(j) % V.row(i) / t1.row(i);
00084         t2.set_size(H.n_cols);
00085         for (size_t k = 0; k < t2.n_elem; ++k)
00086         {
00087           t2(k) = H(j, k) * V(i, k) / t1(i, k);
00088         }
00089 
00090         W(i, j) = W(i, j) * sum(t2) / sum(H.row(j));
00091       }
00092     }
00093   }
00094 
00108   template<typename MatType>
00109   inline static void HUpdate(const MatType& V,
00110                             const arma::mat& W,
00111                             arma::mat& H)
00112   {
00113     // Simple implementation left in the header file.
00114     arma::mat t1;
00115     arma::colvec t2;
00116 
00117     t1 = W * H;
00118     for (size_t i = 0; i < H.n_rows; i++)
00119     {
00120       for (size_t j = 0; j < H.n_cols; j++)
00121       {
00122         // Writing this as a single expression does not work as of Armadillo
00123         // 3.920.  This should be fixed in a future release, and then the code
00124         // below can be fixed.
00125         //t2 = W.col(i) % V.col(j) / t1.col(j);
00126         t2.set_size(W.n_rows);
00127         for (size_t k = 0; k < t2.n_elem; ++k)
00128         {
00129           t2(k) = W(k, i) * V(k, j) / t1(k, j);
00130         }
00131 
00132         H(i,j) = H(i,j) * sum(t2) / sum(W.col(i));
00133       }
00134     }
00135   }
00136 };
